record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - July 14, 2008)

[Page: H6449]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on July 14, 2008, I missed 3 recorded votes.
I take my voting responsibility very seriously. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on recorded vote No. 486, "yea" on recorded vote 487, and "yea" on recorded vote 488.
